amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 92, 96, 103, 105, 108, 118, 121, 129, 131, 132, 134, 135, 136, 138, 139, and 141 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H3130-H3134 of the Congressional Record for May 18, 2012.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-485: Nos. 92, 96, 103, 105, 108, 118, 121, 129, 131, 132, 134, 135, 136, 138, 139, and 141.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A041) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
